name: The Sinless
description:
June 11 1995, Montven Hospital is abandoned by medical staff, leaving patients inside. Doctors and nurses are in shock, unable to speak or remember what happened.

After 4 hours from the event, police evacuated patients and staff remaining in the facility. All evacuated persons exhibited the same symptoms of amnesia and shock.

Lucia Grent and Thomas Gillian are still missing, the police have not found any trace. An agent is sent to the facility to search for them.

How to play

Move : WASD

Look Around : Mouse

Interact with the enviroment : Left mouse button

On / Off  flashlight : F Button

Quit : Press and hold the ESC button for 3 seconds

If your pc is old or does not have a dedicated graphics card for gaming it is recommended to download "The Sinless ( Low Quality )". For any other problem you can contact me at  christopher.laino.dev@gmail.com
